Summary: Rectangular T-shaped object seen from my house. It was viewed from the rear of the UFO. The UFO was fairly close to my vantage point.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around September 5th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsthe date of the sighting was the night september 5th, 2006. i arrived at my bathroom ready to take a shower at around 8 pm pst. from the corner of my eye i saw an object accelerating away from me to the south. when i saw the object i immediatly clearly did not think it was an airplane,helicopter, or baloon, but something else. the object was a t-shaped object and was rectangular in shape. it seemed to be no bigger than a small house.i had a good view of the back of the object and some view of its top. i estimated that it was several hundred feet in the air. in the back it had what looked like a thruster in the center and a light on either side. there also seemed to be a light on the top of the object as well. the color of the lights\thruster was a bright blue glow. the lights were blinking and they seemed fairly small. it certainly did not sound like an airplane at all and was very quiet. it hovered for 3-5 seconds then accelerated.it was a low frequency rumble as it accelerated. it did not make any erratic motions, it continued to head south at remarkable speed and within 10-15 seconds it was gone from my viewpoint. during the encounter i was in complete amazement and awe. i stood there for the duration and just watched it. after the sighting i rushed into my mother's room and told her that i had just seen an ufo. then i ran downstairs and told my dad. i took a quick shower and i headed outside with my dad. outside in my backyard i heard a low grumbling noise and noticed a object with lights blinking about a mile away(my house over looks a large hill), it seemed close to miramar airforce base. it headed north towards a commercial center northeast of my house. it flew near\ between two tall buildings and seemed to be going in a zig-zag motion and then accelerated northward. finally after about a couple minutes i could not see the object anymore. i heard the same low grumbling noise for some time afterwards. -------------- this narrative was based on my memories of my experiences of that night and my report i typed that same night on a ufo discussion website: http:\\www.alienhub.com\showthread.php?t=313 the attachments below are sketches of the ufo along with descriptions of what i saw on that night(sorry they're bad quality) i am interested to see if the airbase picked up anything unsual on their radar on that particualar night. also i can take a polygraph test and undergo hypnosis if neccesary. if you have any questions please email me - thanks
